original_text: Anyone who makes his own body join to a prostitute becomes one body with that prostitute. You should know that. It says in the Bible:
korean_text: 창녀와 합하는 자는 그와 한 몸인 줄을 알지 못하느냐 일렀으되 둘이 한 육체가 된다 하셨나니

sentences.original_text: Anyone who makes his own body join to a prostitute
becomes one body with that prostitute.
